title: Apple voices opposition to security bill that gives government more power to spy on users
text:
Apple voices opposition to security bill that gives government more power to spy on users 
Published By: 9to5mac.com - Today 
Apple this evening has continued its outspoken attitude when it comes to protection of user rights and privacy. The Washington Post reports ...
